name: Harvest Village
description:
You’re a sneaky vampire visiting The Village on the night of the Harvest Festival. Your goal is to harvest as much blood as possible before dawn arrives.

Controls Movement

WASD or left joystick to move

Camera

[Q] and [E] or right joystick

Dash

Spacebar or A to dodge

Attack

Left mouse button or R2 or X to attack

HARVEST

Right mouse button or L2 or B

Harvest as much blood as possible before the sun comes up. Heroes protecting the village will give a greater bounty. Make sure you remove their holy protection before harvesting! If the fight gets tough, go back to the fields and harvest some sweet farmers.

At midnight, the vestal queen of the harvest will appear to participate in the festival…the most pure of all.

Enjoy the festival, dark traveler.
